prompt:
I have the following count table for an RNA-seq experiment, rows are genes and columns are samples, "Supplementary_Table_1_exp.xlsx". The first column of the file is my gene names and the rest of the columns are samples. My annotation data is here  "SRP021193.colData.tsv", it contains sample annotations and rows of this matches the columns of count table, first column is the sample ids. Normalize counts, make two PCA plots for samples, one color coded samples by "group" and the other color coded by "LibrarySelection" in my annotation data.

response:
```
# Load required libraries
library(readxl)
library(DESeq2)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(svglite)

# Read count table
count_table <- read_excel("Supplementary_Table_1_exp.xlsx")

# Read annotation data
annotation_data <- read.table("SRP021193.colData.tsv", header = TRUE, sep = "\t")

# Set gene names as row names in count table
gene_names <- count_table[,1]
count_table <- count_table[,-1]
rownames(count_table) <- gene_names

# Normalize counts using DESeq2
dds <- DESeqDataSetFromMatrix(countData = count_table, colData = annotation_data, design = ~1)
dds <- DESeq(dds)
norm_counts <- counts(dds, normalized = TRUE)

# Perform PCA with samples color coded by "group"
pca_group <- prcomp(t(norm_counts))
group_colors <- annotation_data$group
pca_plot_group <- ggplot(data = data.frame(pca_group$x), aes(x = PC1, y = PC2, color = group_colors)) + 
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "PCA plot of samples (color coded by 'group')")

# Perform PCA with samples color coded by "LibrarySelection"
pca_libraryselection <- prcomp(t(norm_counts))
libraryselection_colors <- annotation_data$LibrarySelection
pca_plot_libraryselection <- ggplot(data = data.frame(pca_libraryselection$x), aes(x = PC1, y = PC2, color = libraryselection_colors)) + 
  geom_point() +
  labs(title = "PCA plot of samples (color coded by 'LibrarySelection')")

# Save the plots as SVG files
svg(file = "pca_plot_group.svg")
print(pca_plot_group)
dev.off()

svg(file = "pca_plot_libraryselection.svg")
print(pca_plot_libraryselection)
dev.off()
```
```

Make sure to replace "Supplementary_Table_1_exp.xlsx" and "SRP021193.colData.tsv" with the actual file names and paths.
